data.title: How I Built a $2 Billion Company by Thinking Small
data.meta_description: Small innovations, small designs, small habits.
data.text:
Jeff Rodman is Co-Founder and Chief Evangelist at Polycom. He co-founded Polycom in 1990, and has been instrumental in the realization of Polycom’s iconic products for voice, video, network communications and other media, accumulating over 30 patents in the process. Follow him on Twitter @jeffreyrodman
